column1: Towards personalized maps: mining user preferences from geo-textual data,Kaiqi Zhao
column6: Gao Cong,Abstract Rich geo-textual data is available online and the data keeps increasing at a highspeed. We propose two user behavior models to learn several types of user preferencesfrom geo-textual data
column7: and a prototype system on top of the user preference models formining and search geo-textual data (called PreMiner) to support personalized maps.Different from existing recommender systems and data analysis systems
column8: PreMiner highlypersonalizes user experience on maps and supports several applications
column9: including usermobility & interests mining
column10: opinion mining in regions
column11: user recommendation
column12: point-of-interest recommendation
column13: and querying and subscribing on geo-textual data.,Proceedings of the VLDB Endowment,2016,*
